books.title: The Book of Creation
books.summary: Creation of the heavens and the earth; order, purpose, blessing

books.title: The Book of Adam & Eve
books.summary: Humanity, the Fall, exile, the spread of sin and consequence

books.title: The Book of Noah
books.summary: Judgment, preservation, covenant, renewal, and the scattering at Babel

books.title: The Book of Abraham
books.summary: The call of Abram, covenant promises, and the testing of faith

books.title: The Book of Isaac
books.summary: The inheritance of promise and the contested blessing

books.title: The Book of Jacob
books.summary: Wrestling with God and man, transformation from Jacob to Israel

books.title: The Book of Joseph
books.summary: What man meant for evil, God meant for good

chapterSummaries.1: God creates the heavens, earth, and all living things in six days
chapterSummaries.2: The garden of Eden, the creation of man and woman
chapterSummaries.3: The serpent, the fall, and exile from Eden
chapterSummaries.4: Cain murders Abel and is marked by God
chapterSummaries.5: The genealogy from Adam to Noah
chapterSummaries.6: The wickedness of humanity and God's decision to flood the earth
chapterSummaries.7: Noah, his family, and the animals enter the ark as the flood begins
chapterSummaries.8: The floodwaters recede and Noah's family leaves the ark
chapterSummaries.9: God's covenant with Noah and the rainbow sign
chapterSummaries.10: The table of nations descended from Noah's sons
chapterSummaries.11: The tower of Babel and the scattering of peoples
chapterSummaries.12: God calls Abram to leave his homeland for a promised land
chapterSummaries.13: Abram and Lot separate; God renews His promise to Abram
chapterSummaries.14: Abram rescues Lot and meets Melchizedek
chapterSummaries.15: God makes a covenant with Abram promising descendants and land
chapterSummaries.16: Sarai gives Hagar to Abram; Ishmael is born
chapterSummaries.17: God establishes circumcision as a sign of His covenant with Abraham
chapterSummaries.18: Three visitors announce Sarah will bear a son; Abraham intercedes for Sodom
chapterSummaries.19: Angels rescue Lot as Sodom and Gomorrah are destroyed
chapterSummaries.21: Isaac is born; Hagar and Ishmael are sent away
chapterSummaries.22: God tests Abraham by commanding him to sacrifice Isaac
chapterSummaries.23: Sarah dies and Abraham purchases a burial cave at Machpelah
chapterSummaries.24: Abraham's servant finds Rebekah as a wife for Isaac
chapterSummaries.25: Abraham dies; Esau sells his birthright to Jacob
chapterSummaries.26: Isaac settles in Gerar and digs wells
chapterSummaries.27: Jacob deceives Isaac and receives Esau's blessing
chapterSummaries.28: Jacob flees to Haran and dreams of a ladder to heaven
chapterSummaries.29: Jacob marries Leah and Rachel after working for Laban
chapterSummaries.30: Jacob's children are born and his flocks multiply
chapterSummaries.31: Jacob flees from Laban with his family and possessions
chapterSummaries.32: Jacob prepares to meet Esau and wrestles with God
chapterSummaries.34: Dinah is violated; her brothers take violent revenge
chapterSummaries.35: God renews His covenant with Jacob at Bethel; Rachel dies
chapterSummaries.37: Joseph's brothers sell him into slavery in Egypt
chapterSummaries.39: Joseph resists Potiphar's wife and is imprisoned
chapterSummaries.40: Joseph interprets dreams for Pharaoh's cupbearer and baker
chapterSummaries.41: Joseph interprets Pharaoh's dreams and becomes second in command
chapterSummaries.42: Joseph's brothers come to Egypt to buy grain
chapterSummaries.43: The brothers return to Egypt with Benjamin
chapterSummaries.44: Joseph tests his brothers with a hidden cup
chapterSummaries.45: Joseph reveals his identity and forgives his brothers
chapterSummaries.47: Joseph manages Egypt's economy during the famine
chapterSummaries.48: Jacob blesses Joseph's sons Ephraim and Manasseh
chapterSummaries.49: Jacob blesses his twelve sons before his death
chapterSummaries.50: Jacob is buried in Canaan; Joseph dies in Egypt
